title: Pioneer plans to scale up biz with automakers in India for future growth
description: Pioneer, the Japanese car audio and entertainment system maker, plans to expand its presence in the Indian automotive market by focusing on partnerships with local automakers. Historically, Pioneer India has concentrated on the aftermarket sector, but the company now aims to enter the original equipment manufacturer (OEM) space.
